short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weather Extension can be used to see the temperature, humidity, wind speed, sun rise and set time and many more

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For users to track weather description and also can manage multiple cities in their watchlist to track weather data.
